author: Soo Kim
title: Global Coronavirus Cases Pass 2.5 Million, With Nearly a Third of COVID-19 Infections in U.S.
description: The U.S. remains the epicenter of the outbreak, with more deaths from the virus than any other country in the world.
content:
The novel coronavirus has infected more than 2,501,000 people across the globe, with the highest number of infections in the U.S.
Spain, Italy, France and Germany are also in the top five countries with the most confirmed cases, as of Tuesday, according to t… [+5580 chars]
